long_description: A clear sleeve for bicycle touring or for mounting on your indoor trainer, the Thule Pack'n Pedal iPad/Map Sleeve fits an iPad or any 10 in. tablet. Thule Pack'n Pedal iPad/Map Sleeve features easy click in/out from Thule Pack 'n Pedal Handlebar Attachment (sold separately). Easy access and use-through clear cover. Waterproof protection. Also great for standard paper maps.
short_description: A clear sleeve for bicycle touring or for mounting on your indoor trainer, the Thule Pack'n Pedal iPad/Map Sleeve fits an iPad or any 10 in. tablet.
